original_text: Some people brought a man to Jesus. This man could not hear anything and he could not speak clearly. The people asked Jesus to put his hand on the man.
korean_text: 사람들이 귀 먹고 말 더듬는 자를 데리고 예수께 나아와 안수하여 주시기를 간구하거늘

sentences.original_text: Some people brought a man to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들이 한 사람을 예수님께 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: This man could not hear anything
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 아무것도 들을 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he could not speak clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 명확하게 말할 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: to put his hand on the man
